name: TV Calendar (PogDesign) - Default Flat Month
description: Default skin flat. (You need to create an account to change the skin and select your own shows)
additional_info:
** Settings
Episode Numbers: ON
Episode Names: ON
Episode Airtimes: ON
Show Networks: ON
Summary Popups : ON
Watched Tick Box: ON
Sort By Airtime: ON
Sunday First: OFF
Calendar Style: MONTH
Show Images: OFF
Episode Time Format: 24HR
Show Premiere Eps: OFF
Style: "Classic View"

** Better with the following uBlock Origin rules (social, ads, cookies, ...) :

www.pogdesign.co.uk##DIV[id="bookmarks"]
www.pogdesign.co.uk##H4
www.pogdesign.co.uk##A[class="twitter-share-button"]
www.pogdesign.co.uk##DIV[class="atop"]
www.pogdesign.co.uk##DIV[class="explain"]
www.pogdesign.co.uk##DIV[class="buttons"]
www.pogdesign.co.uk##DIV[class="replace"]
